LanguageData.FT_Make_ComponentIndustrial.label: Make component
LanguageData.FT_Make_ComponentIndustrial.description: Make a component at the lathe, slower and costlier than using a Fabrication Bench.
LanguageData.FT_Make_ConcreteByBlock.label: Make concrete from stone blocks
LanguageData.FT_Make_ConcreteByChunk.label: Make concrete from stone chunk
LanguageData.FT_Make_ConcreteByStonyJunks.label: Make concrete from junk
LanguageData.FT_Make_ConcreteByStonyJunks.description: Crush non-burnable and non-smeltable stony junk into concrete.
LanguageData.FT_Make_ConcreteCompressed.label: Pack concrete
LanguageData.FT_Make_ConcreteCompressed.description: Pack concrete into bags for easier storage and transportation.\n\nThe Thebian Galactic Trading Etiquette (from the 437th edition onwards) dictates that concrete ought to be packed before being involved in any commercial transaction.
LanguageData.FT_Make_ConcreteWood.label: Make fiber cement
LanguageData.FT_Make_ConcreteWood.description: Mix cloth and concrete into light yet strong concrete planks. Fireproof but less durable than solid concrete.
LanguageData.FT_Make_Dye.label: Synthesize dye
LanguageData.FT_Make_Neutroamine.label: Synthesize neutroamine
LanguageData.FT_Make_ReinforcedBarrel.label: Make reinforced barrel
LanguageData.FT_Make_ReinforcedBarrel.description: Make a reinforced barrel at the lathe.
LanguageData.FT_Make_ReinforcedConcrete.label: Make reinforced concrete
LanguageData.FT_Make_ReinforcedConcrete.description: Mix rebar into raw concrete to get reinforced concrete, an alternative for metallic materials.
LanguageData.FT_Unpack_ConcreteCompressed.label: Unpack concrete
